Reference

All functions

SER_posterior_e_loglik_rss()

posterior expected loglikelihood for a single effect regression

check_projection()

Check whether b in space spanned by the non-zero eigenvectors of A

check_semi_pd()

Check whether A is positive semidefinite

coef(<susie>)

extract regression coefficients from susie fit

compute_MXt()

Computes M%*%t(standardized.X) using sparse multiplication trick

compute_Xty()

Computes t(standardized.X)%*%y using sparse multiplication trick

compute_colSds()

computes column standard deviations for any type of matrix replace matrixStats::colSds since this function only takes a dense matrix

compute_ss()

Compute the needed summary statistics for `susie_ss` from the 'raw' data

estimate_residual_variance()

Estimate residual variance

estimate_residual_variance_ss()

Estimate residual variance for summary statistics

loglik()

The log likelihood function for SER model (based on summary data betahat, shat2), as a function of prior variance V

predict(<susie>)

predict future observations or extract coefficients from susie fit

set_R_attributes()

sets the attributes for the R matrix

set_X_attributes()

sets three attributes for matrix X

single_effect_regression()

Bayesian single-effect linear regression of Y on X

single_effect_regression_rss()

Bayesian single-effect linear regression using z scores.

single_effect_regression_ss()

Bayesian single-effect linear regression of y on X.

summary(<susie>)

summarize susie fit

susie()

SUm of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression

susie_auto()

An attempt to automate reliable running of susie even on hard problems

susie_bhat()

Summary statistics version of SuSiE on betahat, the corresponding standard error, and correlation (or covariance) matrix

susie_get_cs()

Extract credible sets from SuSiE fit

susie_get_lfsr()

Local false sign rate (lfsr) for susie credible sets

susie_get_objective()

Get evidence lower bound (ELBO) from fitted SuSiE model

susie_get_pip()

Compute posterior inclusion probability (PIP) for all variables

susie_get_posterior_mean()

Get posterior mean for coefficients from fitted SuSiE model

susie_get_posterior_sd()

Get posterior standard deviation for coefficients from fitted SuSiE model

susie_get_prior_variance()

Get updated prior variance

susie_get_residual_variance()

Get updated residual variance

susie_init_coef()

initialize a susie object using regression coefficients

susie_plot()

Plot per variable summary in SuSiE CSs

susie_plot_changepoint()

Plot changepoint data and susie fit using ggplot2

susie_plot_iteration()

Diagnostic plot for SuSiE iterations

susie_rss()

Bayesian sum of single-effect (SuSiE) linear regression using z scores

susie_slim()

Slim the result of fitted SuSiE model

susie_ss()

Bayesian sum of single-effect (susie) linear regression using summary stat

susie_trendfilter()

Applies susie to perform trend filtering (especially changepoint problems), a type of non-parametric regression.

update_each_effect()

update each effect once

update_each_effect_rss()

update each effect once

update_each_effect_ss()

update each effect once
